scripts.container:build: docker-compose up -d --build && docker-compose exec laravel bash /app/bin/container-ready.sh
scripts.start: docker-compose up -d && docker-compose exec laravel bash /app/bin/container-ready.sh
scripts.tinker: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan tinker
scripts.key: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan key:generate
scripts.routes: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan route:list
scripts.seed: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan db:seed
scripts.wipe: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan db:wipe
scripts.migrate: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan migrate
scripts.migrate:reset: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan migrate:fresh
scripts.migrate:status: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan migrate:status
scripts.migrate:refresh: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan migrate:refresh
scripts.migrate:undo: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan migrate:rollback --step=1
scripts.test: docker-compose exec laravel php artisan test
scripts.test:js: docker-compose exec laravel npx qunit tests/js/
